10 из 10

38409143.review: Fairly short, but still entertaining. And it's free too.

38404264.review:
This is quite possibly the WORST mystery game I've ever played.
Before you say anything about my short play time, I originally downloaded the game from itch.io. I played through every ending. Upon realizing this game was on Steam, I played long enough with a copy of the game on here that Steam would let me write a review.
I'm not entirely sure if this is meant to be a horror game. If so, it fails. If it is meant to have a creepy atmosphere, it fails. Viva Pinata, an adorable game, has creepier moments than Who Is Mike. Cute dating sims have better ren.py menu customaziation. 
The dialouge does not create a dark atomosphere. The mock-anime art style and expressions are laughable. 
To potential players, if you are looking for a dark, creepy mystery, don't play this game. If you want to laugh at a game that fails at what it is trying to do, go ahead and play Who Is Mike.
To the devolopers, I understand that you did try. The art shows effort. However, I reccommend harder lines, and moving away from the anime-type expressions. The dialouge needs to be darker. The 4th ending made me check if this was a PARODY of horror games. I understand this is supposed to have comedy elements, but the dialouge is so torn between genres, every joke and every creepy moment falls flat. While I'm no expert at ren.py myself, I know how customizable the menus and dialogue boxes are. There's several potential ways to have a cool looking menu, such as making it look like broken or shattered glass. I also reccomend chosing a genre, creepy mystery or comedy mystery. [spoiler] There's a lot more potential with the player as the fake Mike. [/spoiler] I'm sure the devolopers can make a better game than this. While I'm angry in this review, I'm sure you worked hard, but I'm sure you can make a better game.

38314657.review:
I honestly dont think Fervent can put a foot wrong, this is such an experience I cant even.
A lot of guessing games leave you with the answer after the first playthrough, so the second time, you know all the answers, but with this, even if you know the answer, the answer wont necessarily apply the second time.
To sum it up, you wake up to a clone of the character: Mike being stood right in front of you, and your girlfriend comes down to try and figure out who is real and who is the fake. There are 9 different endings. Some of them make you think that the protagonist is the fake, some make it out like the other version of mike is the fake, but the thing is, you could be seeing it from the perspective of the impostor or the original, and you wouldnt know the difference.
Fervent have such skill with such mind games that every time something has their name attatched I get SO excited.
Also its free, what do you have to lose.

38299643.review: Es una novela visual bastante corta, pero de algun modo complicada, es interesante, aunque hay poca trama, le haria falta una segunda parte que explicara un poco mas lo sucedido y dejara mas claro todo, dado que lo ocurrido deja mucho por explorar en la historia, pero me agrado sinceramente me gusto.

38165886.review: At the price of 0, this is a no-brainer. The game takes less than 2 hours to get all endings and even my inexperienced ass got 6 out of 9 routes without using a walkthrough. Even if the middle part seems a bit drawn out, the game is no doubt compelling.

37906318.review: Although it's a little tricky to get all the endings, the story line is very interesting. It's definitely worth reading, even though some of the lines are a little repetitive. Overall, this visual novel is awesome.

37761743.review: Интересная, приятная и интуитивно понятная аудио-визуальная новелла. Присутствуют подсказки, красочная анимация и внимание к деталям. Профессиональная озвучка и качественная прорисовка персонажей. Затягивает и вызывает приятные положительные эмоции.

37711227.review:
~Thought my character was high on drugs
~Started to think Fake-Mike was high on Cocaine
~Punched the computer when Fake-Mike grinned
~Was paranoid for three days
~Came to the conclusion it was a route visual novel
~Goes to the Doctor after having a hurt fist the three days I was paranoid
~Turns out my wrist broke
~Had to wear cast for months
~Found out about this game

10/10 would break wrist again

37118771.review: Short story. Is it great? It was all right. The idea of the game is very good and has a lot of potential. Give it a try if you want you choice matters.

36869711.review:
Creepy but fun!
No use trying to be the good guy and give everyone what they want in this game. You have to stand up and fight for your lady, and you better not let the music distract you!
Recommended for people who dont know what to do with their time or want to play something different than an FPS for a change.

36522565.review:
not a bad visual novel, never gets too dragged out

39499692.review:
Estuve jugando alrededor de una hora, y saqué por el momento tres finales.
Realmente esta muy buena, me encantó, seguro que a medida de que saque los demás finales (que por cierto, me encantan que tengan tantos finales)

40858239.review: A pretty good VN with an interesting premise. You wake up groggy and slightly amnesiac and are faced with a doppleganger of yourself. Most of the endings will involve your girlfriend Sarah trying to figure out which one of you is real by quizzing you both. The interesting thing is that, depening on your choices, you could be the fake or the real one, although there is a true ending. I would've liked to get more info about the creature that fake Mike is, but for a free game with 9 endings, I'm happy with what I got.

40780566.review: Who Is Mike is a fantastic visual novel with interestingly different endings and while some of them are hard to get it still stands as a strong game with great character development and while a bit repetitive, good dialogue. 6.5/10 def would recommend.

40432032.review:
В целом неплохая визуальная новелла с приятной глазу картинкой. К диалогу, как основной форме в подобного рода новеллах, можно временами придраться, но не хочется. Единственное, что на самом деле смущает, так это финал/финалы. Впечатление резкого обрыва, отсутствия раскрытия общего сюжета, какого-то вывода... Возможно, если бы авторы игры чуть развернули, расширили повествование, то, может быть, смогли бы сделать цельный продукт. А так, остается ощущение как от просмотренной первой серии сериала, который закрыли после этой самой первой серии.
Но в целом скорее "Да", чем "Нет".

40377119.review: Really cool & interesting! I've already seen a few endings, would like to see them all ;-) Maybee a shame there aren't Achievements?

40137942.review:
"Who Is Mike" is a great little visual novel. While the story is really short (only took me about a half hour to play through a few times), but it's by no means disappointing. I'd say I was more sad than anything because the story was intriguing, and I wanted to see more about the characters. 

The writing is strong and presents the player with a sense of urgency regarding the choices. And the character art and backgrounds are well done to create an effective mood. If you like choice-based visual novels, you'll likely enjoy giving this one a try. Plus, you can't argue with the price. :)

40111213.review: The right mix between spine chilling mindfack and 4d chess. The first playthrough tells you something about your personality, which is pretty neat. (I am sly btw.)

39530343.review:

I would love the producer to make more and wouldn't mind paying this time .
